item.title: Cooper, Marilyn. 'The Ecology of Writing.''
item.description: One Liner “Writing is one of the activities by which we locate ourselves in the embedded systems that make up the social world,” in a way that is not just thinking but also acting Summary Proposes an ecological perspective on composition and the teaching of composition which draws on educational psychology and linguistics, along with the work in cognitive process. It is a reaction to expressivism as well as cognitive process.
